sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REDON an arrondissement of the department of ‚àèle Vilaine, in France, which is 502 square miles in extent, and is divided into seven cantons, and these into forty-six communes, containing 76,884 inhabitants. The capital is the city of the same name, situated on the river Vilaine. It is well built, has a fine exchange, and in 1836 contained 4506 inhabitants, carrying on a considerable trade in serges and other woollen goods. Long. 2.11. W. Lat. 47.49. 9. N.
